Brian of Bartonia
Bartonian Knights are very well-trained. This Knight has Battle and Life Points higher than an average Knight.
Styvren of Siria
This Knight carries a Holy Lance. The higher his Yellow Mana, the more damage he inflicts.
Edmund of Elenia
This Knight carries a Longbow that adds to his Yellow Mana when he hits. He can also use your own Yellow Mana against you with his Archery skill.
Tharl of Theira
This Knight carries a Theiran Hammer that not only adds to damage, but turns Yellow Gems to Blue.
Godwin of Gildor
Although weaker than the other Knights, this Gildine Knight has expensive armor that protects against much damage.
